content:
Yeah, the drive from San Francisco to Chicago was definitely an adventure! I think my favorite part was driving through the Rocky Mountains in Colorado - the scenery was just breathtaking. And Denver was a great stopover, I got to catch up with some friends and try some of the city's famous craft beer.

As for this upcoming trip, I'm really looking forward to seeing Mount Rushmore up close and exploring the Badlands National Park. I've heard so much about the unique landscape and wildlife there, so I'm excited to experience it for myself. I'm also thinking about doing some hiking in Rocky Mountain National Park, maybe trying to tackle one of the higher peaks if the weather permits.
